name: Engramatic
overview:
Engramatic provides search functions, publishing options, keyword filtering, and analytics for social networks.

Engramatic currently offers a search functions that pulls in data from several social networking sites and offers analysis of keywords occurring in conjunction with the search string and semantic analysis of search results to provide feedback on conversation.

Engramatic also offers one-click publishing across several social networking sites. Once a user’s account is connected to their social graph Engramatic can identify trending terms within their network and let the user quickly filter the results to relevant updates connected to the selected term.
